commit.message:
Upgrading Activiti to 5.12 (this time for true) - with JDK 6 additional Xerces dependency is needed

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/syncope/trunk@1453752 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

files.patch:
